description: A schema for validating patch files in Null's Brawl Mods JSON files.

defaultSnippets.label: @name
defaultSnippets.description: Defines a feature with name only.

defaultSnippets.label: @name + @patches
defaultSnippets.description: Defines a feature with name and patches.

defaultSnippets.label: @name + @description + @patches
defaultSnippets.description: Defines a feature with name, description, and patches.

@patches.description: The patch files associated with this feature.

@conflicts.description: A list of feature keys that conflict with this feature.
